tosdr.case: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
quoteText: THE PLATFORM, THE CONTENT AND SERVICES, AND ANY INFORMATION AVAILABLE IN CONNECTION THEREWITH, ARE PROVIDED ON AN “AS IS, AS AVAILABLE” BASIS, “WITH ALL FAULTS,” AND WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, OR NONINFRINGEMENT.
